title: Just to be clear on Reef Statue
body: Is it no longer possible for me to get my name on the reef statue if I don't have 3 points yet?

replies.body:
its nothing special


your name will be along with

xxnasusop
dragon fighter1
prokiller1
live2kill4
trik2ggez
fgtsplayer
molendo

A Moist Crevice though...

IS THE BEST NAME FOR THIS.

" If you contribute at least three points before this goal is reached"

Sorry man.
